channel.title: Banking on Fatih Kansoy
channel.description: Recent content in Banking on Fatih Kansoy

item.title: Money and Banking
item.description: The course will relate this to recent economic events which have reverberated worldwide. It is particularly suitable for students wishing to enter careers in financial markets or further study in this area. The Money and Banking course will look at some key issues in the theory and practice of financial markets, monetary policy and banking and how their interactions affect the real world.
